ui.trough_hint: Add creatures to calculate trough duration
ui.name: Name
ui.efficiency_recommendation: Add exactly {{count}} stacks to maximize efficiency. Adding more will result in spoilage.
ui.render_disclaimer_text: Calculations assume Stasis. In Render, consumption may vary due to baby stomach limits.
ui.advanced_mode_desc: Simulate logic when you are nearby (Render)
ui.stasis_mode_desc: Calculate assuming no players are nearby (Bulk Spoilage)
ui.auto_duration_tooltip: Automatically set the duration based on the creature that takes the longest to mature.
ui.tek_consumption_note: Refills based on consumption (spoiled meat may remain)

notifications.enable_push_tooltip: Browser notification when trough buffer drops below specific time (keep tab open)
notifications.perm_blocked_hint: Notifications are blocked. Please unblock them in your browser settings URL bar.
notifications.body_depleted: Your {{creature}} is about to run out of food!
notifications.configure_desc: Set a lead time to be notified before the trough is empty.

messages.too_soon_for_notification: Too soon to schedule notification for that lead time!

tooltips.creature: Select the creature species to calculate for
tooltips.birth_time: Time required for incubation or gestation
tooltips.time_to_juvenile: Time remaining until the baby reaches 10% maturation (Juvenile)
tooltips.time_to_adult: Time remaining until the creature is fully grown
tooltips.hand_feed_extended: Can survive with full inventory at {{pct}}% maturation
tooltips.hand_feed: Feed manually until this maturation percentage - then a full inventory lasts until Juvenile
tooltips.current_buffer: How long the baby can survive with its current inventory capacity
tooltips.maturation_needed: Maturation % required to sustain the Desired Buffer with a full inventory
tooltips.food_capacity: Total amount of {{food}} that fits in the inventory based on current weight capacity
tooltips.food_rate: Total food points consumed per minute (scaled by maturation)
tooltips.gen2_hatch: Enable if using Maewing or being in Genesis 2 area for hatch bonus
tooltips.gen2_growth: Enable if being in Genesis 2 area for maturation speed bonus
tooltips.hatch_speed: Server multiplier for egg hatching and bridge incubation
tooltips.maturation_speed: Server multiplier for creature growth speed
tooltips.consumption_speed: Server multiplier for how fast babies consume food
tooltips.selected_food: The primary food source for calculations
tooltips.trough_duration: How long the food in the trough will last before running out
tooltips.food_eaten: Total number of food items consumed by all creatures in the simulation
tooltips.food_spoiled: Total number of food items lost to spoilage during the simulation
tooltips.efficiency: Percentage of food eaten vs total food (including spoilage)
tooltips.trough_type: Spoilage multiplier of the trough (Normal: 4x, Tek: 100x, Maewing: 4x)
tooltips.creatures_in_trough: List of creatures sharing the food in this trough
tooltips.add_current_creature: Add the currently selected creature to the trough list
tooltips.remove_creature: Remove this creature from the list
tooltips.quantity: Number of creatures of this type
tooltips.food_stack: Number of full food stacks in the trough
tooltips.game_version: Toggle between ASA (Ark Survival Ascended) and ASE (Ark Survival Evolved) logic
tooltips.max_food: The maximum amount of food points the creature can hold (Stomach Size)
tooltips.configure_desc: Set how many minutes before empty you want to be notified.
tooltips.start_tracking_desc: Automatically increment maturation % based on species growth rate.

onboarding.welcome_subtitle: Let's set up your experience in just a few steps.
onboarding.game_version_desc: Different versions have different breeding mechanics.
onboarding.notifications_desc: Get alerts when your creatures need attention.
onboarding.creature_desc: Start tracking a baby to see the calculator in action.
onboarding.skip_creature: You can skip this and add creatures later.

errors.tracking_limit_reached: Tracking limit reached ({{limit}}). Pause some creatures first.
